definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: present, specif. bribe;—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Is 1:23 + 22 t.;—bribe, usu. to pervert justice, obj. of [[לָקַח]] Ex 23:8 a (E), = De 16:19 a, De 10:17, 1Sa 8:3, 2Ch 19:7, Ps 15:5, Pr 17:23; + inf., take bribe to do something, De 27:25 Ez Eze 22:12; ´[[אָהַב שׁ]]: Is 1:23; cf. also Is 5:23, Is 33:15, Ex 23:8 b (E) = De 16:19 b, Mic 3:11, Ps 26:10, Pr 17:8, Pr 21:14; ´[[אָהֳלֵי־שׁ]]: Job 15:34, i.e. abode of bribe-givers; ´[[שׁ]]: Pr 6:35 (‖[[כּׂפֶר ]]) is hush-money, or (poss.) legal compensation (cf. Toy); ´[[שׁ]]: elsewh. (c. [[שָׁהַ]]) of bribing king to take sides 1Ki 15:19, 2Ki 16:8, cf. Is 45:13 (‖[[מְחִיר ]]).
